edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao

Interface AttributeDefDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GrouperDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hib3AttributeDefDAO

    public interface AttributeDefDAO
extends GrouperDAO
    attribute def data access methods
